title: Does QSS(Quick Sliver Stash) or Cleanse work against reworked Irelia's disarm from her ult?
body: Pretty much as the title says. If this new debuff called disarm which prevents you from auto-attacking, can you use QSS{{item:3140}}  or Cleanse{{summoner:1}} to remove it?

replies.body:
I have a "question":
Amumu have disarm too, on the ult, right ?

Amumu does not have have a disarm, however champions are unable to auto attack as they are entangled
However, entanglement does not cancel channeled abilities such as a Katarina Death Locus
entangled is just root + disarm in one, though. Just like Lulu's Polymorph is silence, disarm, and slow.
isn't entangled a mix of disarm and root?

It does, yes. In other games a state of being unable to use auto attacks is also called "pacify". His comes with a root as well, which means only spells can be cast while under the effects of his ult.
